name: cybereason-threat-intel
label: Cybereason Threat Intel
description: Access the Cybereason global threat intelligence database on file hashes, IP addresses, and domains.

fields.title: Cybereason Server URL
fields.name: server
fields.description: URL of the Cybereason server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Cybereason Threat Intel URL
fields.name: threat_intel_server
fields.description: IP address or URL of the Cybereason Threat Intel service to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Username
fields.name: username
fields.description: The username used to access the Cybereason server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Password
fields.name: password
fields.description: The password used to access the Cybereason server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.

operations.title: Get File Reputation
operations.description: Returns details of the reputation of a specified file based on the Cybereason's threat intelligence service.

parameters.title: File Hash
parameters.description: Specify the file hash(es), in the MD5 or SHA1 format, whose reputation information you want to retrieve from Cybereason's threat intelligence service.
parameters.name: keys

operations.title: Get IP Reputation
operations.description: Returns details of the reputation of a specified IP address based on the Cybereason's threat intelligence service.

parameters.title: IP Address
parameters.description: Specify the IP address, either IPv4 or IPv6, whose reputation information you want to retrieve from Cybereason's threat intelligence service.
parameters.name: keys

operations.title: Get Domain Reputation
operations.description: Returns details of the reputation of a specified domain based on the Cybereason's threat intelligence service.

parameters.title: Domain Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the domain whose reputation information you want to retrieve from Cybereason's threat intelligence service.
parameters.name: keys
